title: Lvl 5 Spells
content: uid, Circle of the Coast, Wizard Contagion Necromancy ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot No If the spell attack hits, target is afflicted with a disease to choose from 6 proposed. Cleric, Druid, Oath of the Oathbreaker, Undying Destructive Wave Evocation ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot No 5d6Thunder+ 5d6Radiant damage.Create a shockwave of either divine or malevolent thunder that damages nearby creatures and possibly knocks them Prone.1 TurnOn Save: Targets still take half damage Tempest Domain, Paladin, Hexblad
